summary: Two college friends unwittingly release Pinhead and his minions.
cast: Jolene Andersen|Steven Brand|Dan Buran|Camelia Dee|Nick Eversman|Tracey Fairaway|Jay Gillespie|Sue Ann Pien|Sebastien Roberts|Adel Marie Ruiz|Stephan Smith Collins|Devon Sorvari|Fred Tatasciore|Sanny van Heteren
title: Hellraiser: Revelations
